LanguageData.Cassandra.label: Cassandra Classic
LanguageData.Cassandra.description: Cassandra creates story events on a steadily-increasing curve of challenge and tension.
LanguageData.Cassandra.quotation: The essence of good storytelling is the perfect progression of intensifying struggle.
LanguageData.Phoebe.label: Phoebe Chillax
LanguageData.Phoebe.description: Phoebe gives lots of time between disasters to relax and build your colony. But beware - if she's set at a high challenge scale, she'll hit as hard as anyone.
LanguageData.Randy.label: Randy Random
LanguageData.Randy.description: Randy doesn't follow rules. He'll generate random events, and he doesn't care if they make a story of triumph or utter hopelessness. It's all drama to him.
LanguageData.Randy.quotation: The world is random, dude. Stories should be too! Hey, you got a light?
